items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Luxe Feel at a Budget Price - Demi Pick That Actually Delivers
items.body: TL;DR: A soft, elegant faux-mohair cardigan that fits true to size, feels more expensive than its $25-$30 range, and elevates both casual and dressy outfits. A standout value in the budget knitwear category. Pros: Comfortable Fit - Regular fit that’s close to the body without feeling tight. Elevated Look - Gold buttons and plush texture give it a premium, designer-like appeal. Flexible Styling - Works for casual outfits, office attire, or evening layering. Soft & Cozy - The brushed sweater-knit fabric feels smooth, warm, and comfortable for all-day wear. True to Size - Sizing matches standard US expectations. Value-Friendly - Looks and feels pricier than the mid-$20 price point. Notes: Cropped Length - At just under 20 inches, it's slightly shorter than a traditional cardigan. Not a flaw, but worth noting depending on your style preference. General Tips or Tricks: Pair with high-waisted jeans or skirts for the most flattering silhouette. For a dressier look, style over a mock-neck top or satin cami. Wash on delicate and lay flat to dry to maintain the soft texture. Additional Facts / Details: Demi Lovato included this piece as part of Amazon Essentials' curated picks. Faux mohair knit provides warmth without the itching common in real mohair. Ribbed cuffs and bottom hem give structure and prevent stretching. Button-down front allows for open or closed styling versatility. Conclusion: This cardigan punches far above its price point. Between the soft faux-mohair feel, the elegant gold button detailing, and the flattering true-to-size fit, it delivers the look and comfort of a higher-end brand without the cost. For shoppers who want effortless style on a budget, this one earns a solid 5 out of 5 stars. Read more
items.author: CMARSTAC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars check size !
items.body: Just wish it was a little longer in length! Read more
items.author: Carol May

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always pleasantly surprised by quality and fit of Amazon Essentials brand
items.body: This was a great find! I have several basics and some work blouses from Amazon Essentials and they’ve always been much better than the other fast-fashion options on the platform in terms of material, fit, and quality. Wanted a slightly thicker everyday-cardigan for the cold seasons and this is a perfect swap-in for my ultra-thin spring/summer cotton-blend one. Best way I’d describe the fabric is “slightly meaty”… so a good amount of thickness, yet stretchy and squishy. It is 10% wool, and if you have more sensitive skin like myself, the faux mohair might feel a little itchy initially. When I’m actually wearing it, though- even with short sleeved shirts underneath- I don’t notice it at all. I’m also always surprised by how spot-on the brand is with sizing… it is “regular fit” like described- meant to end right above the belt line, skim the silhouette, and have little-to-no drape. I sized up to a Med (I’m usually a US 4-6ish w/ larger chest and shoulders, and wanted a more relaxed fit) but wish I had stuck to my normal size Small because the shoulder & neckline area would have probably fit a little better on me for this piece. Pictures show the garment brand new, but I may just shrink this in the dryer a tad to get the fit a bit closer. Overall, I’m super happy- this will be a great closet staple for chilly weather! Read more
items.author: kt66

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Color, Cozy Feel
items.body: I got this cardigan in Pastel Lilac, which is really more of a soft pink in person, and it’s a very pretty one. The fabric feels soft and almost mohair-like, with a cozy, luxe texture that makes it feel more expensive than it is. It looks great with jeans or trousers and adds just enough texture to an outfit without being bulky. I’m 5'2" and 130 lbs with a high waist and short torso, so I was a little hesitant about the “regular fit” since that usually means longer lengths. But this fits me well, with no awkward bunching or boxy shape. The only downside is the shedding. It leaves fuzz on anything dark or lint-prone, so I skip wearing it with black. Read more
items.author: luxylu

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy, warm, and versatile
items.body: I got this cardigan for my teen daughter. Overall it is a great quality cardigan at a good value, and it looks quality made. I sized up from what I would normally get for my daughter in case she didn't like it, so I could wear it. It fits loosely on her as expected, and it fits me comfortably, though I expected it to be snug on me. It is not like a crop top but the arms are slightly longer than the body of the cardigan. It comes below the waist for me, about to the belt line of medium to high-rise jeans. The faux mohair texture is fluffy and warm. My daughter is particular about textures and sensitive to them. She said she doesn't really like the texture, but it's not particularly itchy or irritating, and she could wear it with a long sleeved shirt since she likes the look and style. To me, it seems more soft, but I can see how it could be a little itchy on bare arms. It has not been shedding for us. We got the black because it will go with almost anything. It goes well with jeans, but it would go well with dressier clothes as well, giving it great versatility. My daughter has worn it unbuttoned to a nice(ish) family restaurant. The gold buttons do give it a polished look. We have not washed it yet, but I think this cardigan is worth the extra care of hand washing and flat drying due to the good quality. Read more
items.author: Hayfever

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pastel Lilac, Cream, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
